title: Survey Response Details

xdm:surveyResponse.description: Stores details related to a survey that has been completed by a user.

xdm:surveyAnswers.title: Survey Answers
xdm:surveyAnswers.description: An array of the answers provided by the visitor within a survey.

xdm:surveyID.title: Survey ID
xdm:surveyID.description: ID for the specific survey taken.

xdm:surveyQuestions.title: Survey Questions
xdm:surveyQuestions.description: An array of the questions presented to the visitor within a survey.
